git.commitMessage: feat: Sprint 16.1 - Position Swapping System Revision

futureTodos: Refactor chat components to use UnifiedChat
newFeatures: Human-to-human position swapping with confirmation modal
Bot position swapping remains instant (no confirmation)
Team change warnings in swap requests
Cross-team swapping support for all players
Swap request system with auto-reject timeout
improvements: Created 7 new reusable frontend components (1,741 lines)
Implemented soft delete pattern for direct messages
Integrated notifications for achievements and friend requests
Added deep linking support for replay sharing
Documented all Sprint 16 features in FEATURES.md (310+ lines)
Updated CLAUDE.md with Sprint 16 socket events
upcomingFeatures: Refactor existing chat components to use UnifiedChat
Advanced friend suggestions (mutual friends + similar skill)
notes: Sprint 16 completed in 1 day (74% of social features, 20/27 tasks)
Sprint 16 added 2,602 lines of new code across 12 files
Direct messaging system with full CRUD operations and real-time delivery
Friend suggestions using multi-factor algorithm (games, mutual friends, ELO)
Player profiles integrated throughout app with clickable names
Replay sharing with deep links enables viral growth
Social Hub consolidates all social features in unified interface
Ready for continued production use with enhanced social connectivity
